title: r/Idontworkherelady "YOU'RE FIRED!" "Lady, I quit months ago"
description: r/Idontworkherelady In today's episode, OP gets tired of working for he toxic manager at her McDonalds job, so he quits. In true Karen fashion, his manager calls him up months later and starts yelling at him for not coming into work on time. OP tries to tell her that he already quit, but she refuses to listen and threatens to fire him if he doesn't come into work. She even sends other employees to his house to drag him into work!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
